column2:
I must say, I was quite skeptical at your search for a solution. Statistically, you should have been burned alive, eaten by wurms, mauled by Destroyers, or all of the above. However, despite all of that, you prevailed. Not bad. I now see why Taimi keeps you around. I will send her a report giving a detailed account of your heroics. Until then, stay temperate.

â€”Scientist Vratt
Throw an explosive lava rock while gliding.
Caliph's Steps: Next to the magma fall at the sealed entrance.
Bonus Chest[s] of the Ember Bay Hero
Striking foes grants you might and inflicts poison.
Unlocks all recipes needed to craft Trust.
Sopor Titanum: Hidden directly west under the second staircase within the ruins.
Bleeding Pulpit: located northeast of the bubbling caldera.
Sudden death! Show off as many moves as you can in the time remaining.
Rake your dagger across your foe, leaving them bleeding.

Find others to help you investigate Ember Bay!
The Guild Wars 2: Heart of Thorns expansion and the Living World episode Rising Flames" are required to access this map."
Smoldering Inlet: Near the peninsula in the inlet, within a small underwater cave.
Osprey Pillars: On the southwestern area, in the basaltic pillar underbelly.
The number of enemy mercenaries and champions that you've helped kill.
Complete %num1% ranked season game[s] to earn your skill rating.
Locate magical soft spots where rifts may occur.
<c=@abilitytype>Dual Attack.</c> Burn your foes within a plasma blast.
<c=@abilitytype>Dual Attack.</c> Fire a superheated jet of plasma at your foe.
Earned from PvP League Division Chests.
Protect griffon nests, kill corrupted predators, and incubate abandoned eggs.

Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.
Combine 3 Mini Elegant Black Llamas with an Essence of Llamatic Elegance in the Mystic Forge to make a Mini Lavish Black Llama.
Fire a quick shot in an evasive retreat. Gain swiftness. This can be used while retreating.
Earned by making capture progress or by being in combat near a neutral or enemy capture point.
